DataElement.preferredName: Intervention or Procedure Unique Record Link Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.:The single one of its kind._A sequence of characters used as a linkage between related records.:The single one of its kind._A sequence of characters used as a linkage between related records._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A particular course of action intended to achieve a result.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
